channel.title: ActionHandler

item.title: ActionHandler
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Exactly. Except, you don’t always have to use brackets.

if (thisAction = true) 
	completeAction();
else 
	doNotCompleteAction();
if (thisAction = true) {
	completeAction();
} else {
	doNotCompleteAction();
}

Those are the same, it’s a matter of readability. I personally prefer the latter.

Read full topic

}

item.title: ActionHandler
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Check the conventions.

For every { there should be a closing }.
